description: This header file declares functions for parsing and handling Comcast battery saving data within a Zigbee device driver context. It includes function prototypes for parsing data buffers into structured data and updating resources based on device data in a Zigbee environment.

methods.name: comcastBatterySavingDataParse
methods.description: Parses a buffer into a ComcastBatterySavingData structure, returning a pointer to the parsed data or NULL if parsing fails.

methods.name: comcastBatterySavingHelperUpdateResources
methods.description: Updates related resources based on received Comcast battery saving data for a specific device identified by EUI64.
